abstract: Former rap mogul Marion 'Suge' Knight pleads not guilty in Compton, Calif, to charges of murder and attempted murder before being rushed to hospital for chest pains; Knight is accused of intentionally trying to run over two men with pickup truck.
lead_paragraph: Marion Knight, the former chief executive of Death Row Records who is known as Suge, pleaded not guilty Tuesday to murder and attempted murder charges before complaining of chest pain and being rushed to a hospital.

headline.main: California: Ex-Rap Mogul Falls Ill at Court Appearance
headline.print_headline: California: Rap Mogul Falls Ill at Court Appearance

snippet: Marion Knight, the former chief executive of Death Row Records who is known as Suge, pleaded not guilty Tuesday to murder and attempted murder charges before complaining of chest pain and being rushed to a hospital.
